AI Description: SeqCode is a software tool designed for identifying coding sequences in prokaryotic genomes using a comparative genomics approach. It helps in accurately predicting protein-coding genes and functional elements.
Core Features: Identification Of Coding Sequences In Prokaryotic Genomes, Utilizes Comparative Genomics Methods, Accurate Prediction Of Protein-Coding Genes, Detection Of Functional Elements
General Tags: Genomics, Prokaryotic Genomes, Coding Sequences, Comparative Genomics, Gene Prediction
